title: Lag or low FPS ?
body: After the 5.13 patch i faced a lot of inconsistency in my ping and sometimes my ping goes from 80 to 2200 which is obviously unplayable. When my ping is low sometimes my character starts gliding or just suddenly appeared and reappear on a different place. Whats happening !?

replies.body:
Definitely Lag,

When the connection drops out one way to describe it is your PC acts out a sort of rendition of what was happening pre disconnect and when trying to play it out without a connection to the riot servers you get weird displays of sliding or looping motion.

Needless to say none of this is occurring for anyone else however your walking/attacking commands pre disconnection may still be being executed on all the other play's PCs.

When your PC reconnects it suddenly bring back the current state of the game and that's why you seem like you randomly disappear and re-appear somewhere else as the loss in communication because of the connection drop leads to unknown information which becomes suddenly realized when your PC reconnects.

FPS issues are characterized by jagged motion not to be mistaken for disappearing and re appearing as you will notice when you get a lag spike the motion is still smooth even though you reappear somewhere else (unless you have both problems).


Hope this explanation helps,

-Conrad.


P.S in terms of the patch it would have little effect on your connection and your issue is with connection which may be resulted by changes to your network in which case you may have to contact internet providers. It also may be simply an increase in strain on the network such as a sibling watching you-tube and such. In which case you can take measures to lower this impact by increasing the priority of your PC in the router settings.
